spell_tooltip.description: Chains of Ice reduces the target's Haste by 8%. Frost Strike refreshes the duration of Chains of Ice.

Pillar of Frost grants you Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by 400% and its radius by 150%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration.

Pillar of Frost's cooldown is increased by 15 sec.
Howling Blast applies Delirium, reducing the cooldown recovery rate of movement enhancing abilities by 50% for 12 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 72,873 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a geist to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one geist at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 16.3 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 122,561 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 376,598 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 260,309 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 206,384 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 35,626 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 433,962 Frost damage over 12 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate deal Frost damage and critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases Frost Strike damage by 20%.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 67,084 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 602,408 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 36,376 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 167,524 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 403,731 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 40,480 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 159,014 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 704,592 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 242,943 Shadowfrost damage and applies Frost Fever. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 71,332 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a geist to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one geist at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Strike an enemy for 72,807 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 333,078 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.

When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 713,567 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 241,258 Shadowfrost damage and applies Frost Fever. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 72,751 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a geist to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one geist at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 16.3 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.

Strike an enemy for 72,594 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 333,078 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Leech by 3%.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 122,561 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 376,668 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 258,244 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 207,779 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 34,904 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 433,962 Frost damage over 12 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate deal Frost damage and critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by 20.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 64,568 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 596,014 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
When empowered by Rime, Howling Blast deals 60% increased damage to your primary target.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 167,524 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
Your Runic Power spending abilities have a chance to additionally deal 45% of the damage dealt over 4 sec.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.

Continuously deal 187,360 Frost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Generates 2 Runes at the start and end.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.

Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Can only occur every 2 min.

Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 374,759 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Casting Anti-Magic Shell grants 2 nearby allies a Lesser Anti-Magic Shell that Absorbs up to 417,375 magic damage and reduces the duration of harmful Magic effects against them by 50%.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 258,915 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 206,392 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 35,589 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever

Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.

When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 69,458 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 36,119 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 167,524 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.

While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at 80% effectiveness.

You may only benefit from this effect every 45 sec.
When Obliterate damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
Obliterate shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 227,099 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The damage of your diseases and Frost Strike are increased by 10%.
Every 50 Runic Power you spend extends the duration of the Horsemen's aid in combat by 1 sec, up to 5 sec.
Obliterate deals 10% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
